attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it illegal for anybody convicted of any form of benefit fraud to be given taxpayer pounds in the form of welfare benefits, ever again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the same way that those who abuse children are barred from working with children for the duration of their natural lives, anybody who defrauds the taxpayer through theft of welfare benefits should be barred from receiving such welfare benefits - including taxpayer funded NHS medical treatment - for the remainder of their natural lives. These people have to know that being caught for defrauding welfare benefits will have a devastating affect upon their future lives, refunding the money nor a jail sentence comes anywhere near appropriate punishment for this crime against the people of this country.
